text:
The code above reads in a value from the command line and adds 1000 to it.

The code then prints the value to the console.

The code then returns 0.

The code is vulnerable to a buffer overflow attack.

The code is vulnerable to a format string attack.

The code is vulnerable to a heap overflow attack.

The code is vulnerable to a stack overflow attack.

The code is vulnerable to a race condition attack.
